title: brndAvana vihAra
sahitya:
brndAvana vihAra brndAraka varada narasimhENa pAlita prahlAdAvatAra


caraNam 1    bhuvanE bahu prakhyAta bhuvana giri grAmE gOpAmba timmaNNa putrAvatAra shrI rAghavEndra
    caraNam 2    gAna vidyA Adi tAta nAma purandaradAsa bOdha guru shrI vyAsarAyAvatAra shrI rAghavEndra
    caraNam 3    kumbhapuE kucala vasita madhva pITha mahita bhUSa guru sudhIndra yatinA
        tanjapura shrImaNi tIrE mangaLashramAkAra shrI rAghavEndrA
    caraNam 4    vijaya rAghavEndranuta digvijaya rAghavEndra amala tungA tIra vAsa
        atula karuNA manjuSA vimala sundarA vibhO shrI rAghavEndra
